name: Yellow Pepe
description: $YELPE, Yellow Pepe is a vibrant, cheerful variant of the beloved Pepe the Frog character, embodying positivity and good vibes. Yellow Pepe symbolizes optimism and fun with its bright yellow hue and playful expression, making it a perfect mascot for a meme coin. Yellow Pepe combines humor, community spirit, and unique branding to create a meme coin that not only entertains but also fosters connections within the crypto space. With its sunny disposition, Yellow Pepe aims to become a symbol of positivity in the often tumultuous world of cryptocurrency. Inspired by king of memes this cycle, Pepe.
